text: Bremen-Hemelingen () is a railway station located in Bremen, Germany. The station is located in Hemelingen on the Wanne-Eickel–Hamburg railway and the train services are operated by NordWestBahn. The station has been part of the Bremen S-Bahn since December 2010. ==Train services== The station is served by the following services: *Bremen S-Bahn services Bremerhaven-Lehe - Osterholz- Scharmbeck - Bremen - Twistringen ==References== Category:Railway stations in Bremen (state)
title: Bremen-Hemelingen railway station
